headline.main: Paid Notice: Memorials  BEGELMAN, GLADYCE LARGEVER RUDIN

snippet: BEGELMAN--Gladyce Largever Rudin. It's been 30 years and you are still deep in our hearts and minds. We miss your smile, your beautiful face, your zest for life and all the "luv" you spread so generously. Your spirit lives on in all your children, grandchildren and great-grandchildren. We "luv" you back. Beth, Bill and the entire Rudin Family 1/3
lead_paragraph: BEGELMAN--Gladyce Largever Rudin. It's been 30 years and you are still deep in our hearts and minds.
